21 class Database extends DatabaseOperationsTrait {
22  private $dbType;

42  public function __construct($dbType, $dbName, $serverName = "127.0.0.1", $port = "3306", $user = "root", $password = "", $options = [], $cache = false) {
43  $this->dbType = $dbType;
44  $this->dbName = $dbName;
45  $this->serverName = $serverName;
46  $this->port = $port;
47  $this->user = $user;
48  $this->password = $password;
49  if (isset ( $options ["quote"] ))
50  SqlUtils::$quote = $options ["quote"];
51  $this->options = $options;
52  if ($cache !== false) {
53  if (\is_callable ( $cache )) {
54  $this->cache = $cache ();
55  } else {
56  if (\class_exists ( $cache )) {
57  $this->cache = new $cache ();
58  } else {
59  throw new CacheException ( $cache . " is not a valid value for database cache" );
60  }
61  }
62  }
63  }
64 
71  public function connect() {
72  try {
73  $this->_connect ();
74  return true;
75  } catch ( \PDOException $e ) {
76  throw new DBException ( $e->getMessage (), $e->getCode (), $e->getPrevious () );
77  }
78  }
79 
80  public function getDSN() {
81  return $this->dbType . ':dbname=' . $this->dbName . ';host=' . $this->serverName . ';charset=UTF8;port=' . $this->port;
